FieldSet.description: DataBase: CMDB Class that is used to represent a logical database (a collection of interrelated data organized into one or more schemas and treated as a unit). You should create an instance of this class for each separately manageable database. To represent an installation of a database management system, use the BMC_SoftwareServer class (set its SoftwareServerType attribute to DatabaseServer). Alternately, you can use the BMC_Application class (set its ApplicationType attribute to InfrastructureApplication).To represent database storage areas, use the BMC_DataBaseStorage class. The key to a BMC_DataBase instance in an enterprise environment is its Name attribute. This class corresponds to the DMTF class CIM_CommonDatabase.
FieldSet.label: Database
